data.title: Start Round Aggressive Dart From Stairs to Outside B Main
data.description: Use this fast dart at the start of the round for early information, or to set up your teammates looking for an aggressive play towards outside B Main.

data.title: Front A Site Cannon Retake Recon Bolt
data.description: This Recon Bolt lands on the front right tip of a cannon pointing up in the air on the front side of A Site. Landing the arrow on the right corner of the tip of this cannon can be useful when retaking A Site, since the arrow will scan the entire front side of A Site, and behind the right side of Generator.
